de.stroeer.core

Class BaseApi<S extends BaseBackgroundService>

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.stroeer.core.BaseApi<S>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    StroeerProxityApi

    public abstract class BaseApi<S extends BaseBackgroundService>
extends java.lang.Object
    Created by dustin on 14.11.16. Is responsible for: - holding a background service - check if a background service wath succesfully bound isBound() - set a new background service #onServiceConnected(java.lang.Object) - set the background service to null #onServiceDisconnected(java.lang.Object) - perform a reflective call with the background service execute(de.stroeer.core.BaseApi.AsynCallback, String, Object[]) - get the bounden background service getBackgroundService() - check hard if a background service is bound checkBoundHard() - Contains an interface for an asynCallback
